description: A representation of multiple registrations for the same entity

___sample_date.description: date when alternate registration was sampled

___retrieved_at.description: date when alternate registration was retrieved

___start_date.description: date when alternate registration was valid from

___source_url.description: URL of the source of the data (e.g. download URL), or if there is not persistent URL the page from which it can be found (e.g. search page)

___publication_date.description: the publication date of the filing/notice that gives details of the alternate registration

___alternate_entities.description: array of entities that are linked via alternate registrations
